concept.title: Object Storage
concept.shortdesc: Eucalyptus supports Walrus and Riak as its object storage backend. There is no extra planning if you use Walrus. If you use Riak, Basho recommends that you run no fewer than five data servers for each Eucalyptus cluster. This also means that you have to set up and configure a load balancer between the Riak servers and the object storage gateway (OSG).
